misalignments.reasoning: Spec requires endpoint POST /api/auth/register, but code implements POST /api/auth/signup
Spec requires link text 'Don't have an account? Register' but code has 'Don't have an account? Register' (correct) with different styling
Spec requires error format with nested structure {error: {code, message}}, but frontend code expects data.error as a string or object (inconsistent handling)
